personalInformation.title: Software Engineer

summary: Experienced Software Engineer with a strong background in full-stack web development, cloud computing, and team leadership. Passionate about building scalable software and delivering user-focused solutions.

responsibilities: Led a team of 5 developers in building cloud-native web applications.
Designed and implemented REST APIs with Node.js and Express.
Optimized front-end performance using React and Redux.
Collaborated with DevOps for CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and AWS.
Built and maintained internal tools using Angular and Django.
Wrote unit and integration tests, improving code coverage to 90%.
Participated in agile ceremonies and cross-functional team projects.
